nodes.description: Nehmad家族于上周六参加耶路撒冷儿子成年礼，Gafnit因预感不安未前往
nodes.support_text: Gafnit had a premonition, a bad feeling.

nodes.description: Shabbat结束后Nehmad家族在Mahane Israel参加 havdalah仪式，Shauli两次往返取酒
nodes.support_text: When the Shabbat ended, and guests started to leave Mahane Israel, the Nehmad family gathered on the street outside for the havdalah ceremony.

nodes.description: 第二次取酒返回时遭遇恐怖袭击，Shauli当场死亡，Eli重伤失臂
nodes.support_text: Shauli twice ran to fetch some wine. The explosion went off as he was returning the second time.

nodes.description: Shlomi用身体保护Ronit家人，但与妻子Gafnit及两个女儿Shiraz、Liran共同遇难
nodes.support_text: Shimon Ilan said yesterday that he ran to Lidor, who was lying on the road. 'I hugged him and said `don't die, don't die, your father loves you.'

nodes.description: Ezra返回家中协助尸体识别，通过指纹确认七名遇难者身份
nodes.support_text: Ezra Nehmad returned to his home in Rishon Letzion, stunned and disconsolate. A policeman came with him, to take fingerprints for use in identifying the corpses.

nodes.description: Rabbi Ezran在葬礼发表政治性悼词，谴责与恐怖分子谈判
nodes.support_text: Rishon Letzion's chief rabbi, Rabbi Yosef Ezran, declared: 'Where are the bleeding hearts who have called for talks with the murderers. Government of Israel: wake up! We are doing business with cursed monsters.'

nodes.description: 市长Nitzan将恐怖分子比作野兽，呼吁加强军事打击
nodes.support_text: 市长Nitzan said: 'The terrorist calls himself a person, [but] he is an animal. When we learn how to deal with predatory animals as though they should be hunted down, we'll know how to deal with the nest of vipers which has raised them.'

nodes.description: 卫生部长Dahan称遇难者为被提前剪除的‘最美丽花朵’
nodes.support_text: In his eulogy for the seven victims, Health Minister Nissim Dahan exclaimed: 'They cut off the most beautiful flowers before their time was due.'

nodes.description: Nehmad家族在Rishon Letzion的墓地举行集体葬礼，依次安葬七名恐袭受害者
nodes.support_text: 他们依次在Rishon Letzion的墓地埋葬了死者

nodes.description: 数百名家庭成员等聚集在墓地周围的树丛和墓穴之间
nodes.support_text: 数百名家庭成员等聚集在墓地周围的树丛和墓穴之间

nodes.description: Nehmad家族前往耶路撒冷参加成年礼
nodes.support_text: Nehmad family attended the bar mitzvah in Jerusalem last Saturday
Ezra Nehmad asked Shauli to bring wine

edges.support_text: Gafnit had a premonition, a bad feeling.
Shauli twice ran to fetch some wine. The explosion went off as he was returning the second time.
取酒行动发生在仪式期间
Shimon Ilan said yesterday that he ran to Lidor, who was lying on the road. 'I hugged him and said `don't die, don't die, your father loves you.'
Ezra Nehmad returned to his home in Rishon Letzion, stunned and disconsolate. A policeman came with him, to take fingerprints for use in identifying the corpses.
恐袭发生后需进行埋葬仪式
腿部受伤发生在拥抱和呼救之后

Rishon Letzion's chief rabbi, Rabbi Yosef Ezran, declared: 'Where are the bleeding hearts who have called for talks with the murderers. Government of Israel: wake up! We are doing business with cursed monsters.'

市长Nitzan said: 'The terrorist calls himself a person, [but] he is an animal. When we learn how to deal with predatory animals as though they should be hunted down, we'll know how to deal with the nest of vipers which has raised them.'
In his eulogy for the seven victims, Health Minister Nissim Dahan exclaimed: 'They cut off the most beautiful flowers before their time was due.'
埋葬完成后家庭成员聚集
